title: Sepideh Moafi
summary: Sepideh Moafi (Persian: سپیده معافی; born September 18, 1985) is an Iranian-American actress and singer. Moafi is best known for her role as Gigi Ghorbani in The L Word: Generation Q and Loretta in The Deuce.  Moafi has also starred in Notorious, Falling Water and The Killing of Two Lovers.
